Home About Blog Staff

Our company was founded by passionate guides more than 20 years ago,
and guiding continues to be the heart and soul of who we are.
We require that all of our guides undergo extensive safety training before officially
joining us a mountain and/or glacier guide. Our certified and knowledgeable guides live
and breathe the outdoor adventure life. They use their extensive mountaineering and trekking
training to safely lead travelers on adventures, and to pursue personal outdoor challenges.

We are proud to have guides from different nationalities on the team.
English is the primary language spoken on all of our tours but, collectively, our guides speak over a dozen.
Browse through our guide profiles to learn more about each guide’s background and qualifications.
You might even learn a random fact about them.
